snippet: Colombia’s Ministry of Defense said Friday that Colombian rebels were responsible for killing an Ecuadorean Army officer and wounding a soldier during a border skirmish on Thursday.
abstract: Colombia’s Ministry of Defense says Colombian rebels are responsible for killing an Ecuadorean Army officer and wounding a soldier during a border skirmish.
lead_paragraph: Colombia’s Ministry of Defense said Friday that Colombian rebels were responsible for killing an Ecuadorean Army officer and wounding a soldier during a border skirmish on Thursday.

headline.main: Colombia: A Clash on the Border
headline.print_headline: Colombia: A Clash on the Border
